Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora, with gradual curve. Clay near fine buff-brown; some mica; worn slip. Rectangular stamp. Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 132, 3. Name Simos.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1209)
